attributes.action: Self Defece Law to be created in the UK
attributes.additional_details: 20% of women in prison are serving sentences because they fought back against abusers. This is wrong, please sign in order for our government to acknowledge self defence
attributes.background:
Thousands of people are serving prison sentences because they have stood up against abusers.
Today's law states that you should let the attacker kill or injure you without recourse.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. Self-defence is already available as a defence in some circumstances. You can find out more here:

http://www.cps.gov.uk/legal/s_to_u/self_defence/

You could start a new petition explaining clearly how you would like the law to be changed.
